plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Blueacea Partner to access your camera
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Blueacea Partner to access your microphone

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Blueacea Partner to use your location.

plugins.userFacingNotificationsPermission: Allow Blueacea Partner to send you notifications.

plugins.contactsPermission: Allow Blueacea Partner to access your contacts.

plugins.mediaLibraryPermission: Allow Blueacea Partner to access your photos and media files.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos and record videos.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to your microphone for audio recording.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location to provide location-based features.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs location access even when in the background for tracking purposes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload or view media.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your contacts to display and manage contact information.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app needs permission to track your activity for a personalized experience.
